T001.name: daily_checkin_reminder
T001.message: Good morning! Time for your daily health check-in. How are you feeling today?

T002.name: medication_reminder
T002.message: Reminder: It's time for your {medication_time} medications. Please take them as prescribed.

T003.name: appointment_reminder
T003.message: You have an upcoming appointment on {appointment_date} at {appointment_time}. Please confirm your attendance.

T004.name: symptom_followup
T004.message: You reported {symptom_type} during your last check-in. Has this improved, stayed the same, or gotten worse?

T005.name: goal_progress
T005.message: Great progress on your {goal_name} goal! You've completed {completed_count} of {total_count} activities this week.

T006.name: streak_celebration
T006.message: Amazing! You've maintained your {habit_name} streak for {streak_days} days! Keep up the great work!

T007.name: vitals_reminder
T007.message: Time to check your {vital_type}. Please log your reading when complete.

T009.name: lab_result_available
T009.message: Your recent lab results are now available. Please review them in your health portal.

T010.name: refill_reminder
T010.message: Your {medication_name} prescription may need a refill soon. Please contact your pharmacy if needed.

T012.name: hydration_reminder
T012.message: Stay hydrated! Remember to drink water throughout the day.

T013.name: exercise_encouragement
T013.message: Ready for some light activity? Even a short {activity_type} can boost your energy and mood.

T014.name: sleep_reminder
T014.message: It's getting late. Consider winding down for a restful night's sleep.

T015.name: urgent_followup
T015.message: Based on your recent responses, your care team would like to follow up with you. Please expect a call or message soon.
